name: Is survey data deleted following export?
title: Is survey data deleted following export?
body:
Overview

This article addresses the question of whether survey data is deleted following export in our survey platform. It provides clear information about data retention and export policies.

 

Information

No. Your survey data will only be deleted if you cancel your account. You can download your survey results as many times as you like as long as you hold a valid license. Data will not be deleted when exported.

 

FAQ

Is survey data deleted following export?

No, your survey data is not deleted after exporting. The data remains in our system and can be accessed and exported multiple times as long as you have a valid license.

Can I export my survey data more than once?

Yes, you can download your survey results as many times as you like, as long as you hold a valid license.

How long is my survey data retained?

Your survey data is retained for as long as you maintain an active account with a valid license. The data is only deleted if you cancel your account.
